title: 2K Wins! And a coincidence?
body:
Just had my 2000th win in Normals. By the off chance I had taken a break from playing some Mordekaiser, I chose my Main (since his release), BRAND! Not only did I accidentally get my 2k win with my all time Fav, also got an S+!

On a sad note, 2k wins and still don't have enough ip for all champions, 5 short :/ something wrong with the system.

http://imgur.com/1wfLBBj

replies.body: ah i remember them days when people go on the boards and ask riot to play with them for their 1000th win in norms....

It still happens. Not many people do it though :P 

I'm 2 wins away and I'm hyped :3
